Hi All,

When i publish the WPF application xml file which is in the Shell application are not read it causing the DataBase connectivity issue. Does anybody seen the issues like this.

Thanks and Regards,

Sakthi

Hi Sakthi,

If you are deploying your WPF application using ClickOnce, I believe your problem might be related to the one described in the following blog post:

  • ClickOnce and XML files not being published by Visual Studio

Regards,

Damian Cherubini
http://blogs.southworks.net/dcherubini

Hi DCherubini,

My issue is same as explained in the link. But i didn't get any xml DataFiles in the ApplicationFiles Button click window. That window only showing deployed dll's not the xml files.

Hi,

You could check if your file's "Build Action is set to "Content". That should make the files appear in the Application Files Dialog window.

Also as this is not strictly related to Prism I believe you could find more detailed information about this problem in the Click Once Forums.

For example, you could check the following threads:

  • add file to clickonce
  • xml files are not deployed to directory where the application is running

I hope you find this handy,

Agustin Adami
http://blogs.southworks.net/aadami

Hi Aadami,

Thank you so much for your time and I got the solution and application working Great.

Thanks and Regards,

Sakthi
